Powerful Features for Your Vape Business

Everything you need to manage and grow your vape store efficiently

Real-Time Dashboard

Get instant insights into your business performance with comprehensive analytics and key metrics.

Inventory Management

Track stock levels, manage suppliers, and maintain detailed inventory logs with automatic alerts.

Refill Bottle Tracking

Smart bottle management system to track refills, monitor usage, and optimize your refill services.

Sales Management

Complete sales tracking with detailed transaction history and customer purchase patterns.

Advanced Reports

Generate detailed business reports with customizable analytics and export capabilities.

Supplier Management

Manage vendor relationships, track orders, and maintain supplier contact information.
